name: Epic Tower Defense
description:
A robot invasion is overrunning the city and you've been placed in charge of our last line of defense!

  • Position towers along their path to stop them before they reach the survivors.
  • Upgrade towers for extra stopping power, or sell a poorly placed tower to try somewhere else.
  • The city will pay for dead robots - use these funds to reach your goal and save the city.

This game was built as part of the GameDevHQ Intensive Training Program. Graphics provided by GameDevHQ, code by me.
